Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/ACE Inhibitor/Moexiprilat
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A non-sulfhydryl angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor with antihypertensive activity. Moexiprilat competitively inhibits ACE, thereby blocking the conversion of angiotensin I to angiotensin II. This prevents the actions of the potent vasoconstrictor angiotensin II and leads to vasodilatation. This agent also prevents angiotensin II-induced aldosterone secretion by the adrenal cortex, thereby promoting diuresis and natriuresis.
